member.summary: Unknown gender. You will only see this appearing when for example the is .

member.summary: Ped is a male.

member.name: T:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags
member.summary: Flags that can be used to play animations.

member.name: F:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags.None
member.summary: None.

member.name: F:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags.StayAtNewPosition
member.summary: Don't come back to initial position after animation ends, we use this for animations that result in position change for the ped, for example the land and roll animation

member.name: F:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags.Unknown02
member.summary: Unknown.

member.name: F:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags.Unknown03
member.summary: Unknown.

member.name: F:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags.ReturnToOriginalPosition
member.summary: Not well tested but this might make the ped return to its original position.

member.name: F:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags.Loop
member.summary: This loops the animation.

member.name: F:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags.FreezeAtLastFrame
member.summary: The ped will play the animation, and then freezes in the last frame of the animation.

member.name: F:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags.SwitchToIdleAnimAfterEnd
member.summary: Seems that makes the ped reset to standing idle animation after the animation ends.

member.name: F:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags.Unknown08
member.summary: Unknown.

member.name: F:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags.PlayInUpperBodyOnly
member.summary: Plays the animation only in the upper body of the ped. Useful for when playing animation in cars.

member.name: F:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags.RemoveSound
member.summary: Removes the sound of the animation. Some animations have sound while others dont.

member.name: F:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags.Unknown11
member.summary: Unknown.

member.name: F:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags.Unknown12
member.summary: Unknown.

member.name: F:CCL.GTAIV.AnimationFlags.PlayInUpperBodyWithWalk
member.summary: This makes the ped able to walk while an animation in playing in its upper body.

member.name: T:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld
member.summary: Functions that involve stuff with the world. Like spawning things.

member.name: P:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld.PedDensity
member.summary:
Sets the ped density.
0.0 is off, 1.0 is default, 2.0 is twice as much as normal, etc.

member.name: P:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld.CarDensity
member.summary:
Sets the car density.
0.0 is off, 1.0 is default, 2.0 is twice as much as normal, etc

member.name: P:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld.ParkedCarDensity
member.summary:
Sets the parked car density.
0.0 is off, 1.0 is default, 2.0 is twice as much as normal, etc

member.name: P:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld.RandomCarDensity
member.summary:
Sets the random car density.
0.0 is off, 1.0 is default, 2.0 is twice as much as normal, etc

member.summary: Sets if random trains are allowed to appear.

member.name: P:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld.AllowRandomBoats
member.summary: Sets if random boats are allowed to appear.

member.name: P:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld.AllowAmbientPlanes
member.summary: Sets if ambient planes are allowed to appear.

member.name: P:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld.AllowGarbageTrucks
member.summary: Sets if garbage trucks are allowed to appear.

member.name: P:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld.GravityEnabled
member.summary: Sets if the gravity should be enabled or not. Some things in the world might not be affected by setting this to .

member.summary: Gets or sets the current weather in the world.

member.name: P:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld.CurrentDate

member.name: M:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld.MuteGameworldAndPositionedRadioForTV(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This function mutes almost all sounds in the game. Some "front end" sounds, like info beeps and cell phone beeps, car radios, cutscenes, and the TV aren't affected.
member.param: Sets if the world should be muted or not.

Sets how much the cam will shake.

member.name: M:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld.SetDoorState(System.UInt32,System.Numerics.Vector3,System.Boolean,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the state of the closest door with the given model.
member.param: The door cannot be moved when locked.
The current door angle. 0 is closed, 1 is open, -1 is open to the other direction.

member.name: M:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld.LoadEnvironmentNow(System.Numerics.Vector3)
member.summary:
Loads the environment at the given position.
Warning: Can cause a freeze for a few seconds.

member.name: M:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld.SpawnPed(System.String,IVSDKDotNet.GTAMatrix,System.Int32@,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new ped with the given model name at the given position.
member.param: The model name of the ped.
Returns the handle of the ped if the function succeeded. The handle can be used with all sorts of native functions that want the handle of a ped.
Sets if the ped should be added to the world. Default is true.
Sets if the ped should be marked as a mission ped. This will prevent the ped from despawning. Default is false.
member.returns: If successful, the newly created is returned. Otherwise, null.

member.name: M:CCL.GTAIV.NativeWorld.SpawnPed(System.String,System.Numerics.Vector3,System.Int32@,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)

Sets if the ped should be added to the world. Default is true.
Sets if the ped should be marked as a mission ped. This will prevent the ped from despawning. Default is false.
member.returns: If successful, the newly created is returned. Otherwise, null.

member.summary: Gets the next position on street at the given .

member.name: T:CCL.GTAIV.NewsScrollbar
member.summary: Stuff for the news scrollbar in The Triangle, south of Star Junction.

member.name: M:CCL.GTAIV.NewsScrollbar.AddStringToNewsScrollbar(System.String)
member.summary:
This method adds a string to the news scrollbar as seen in The Triangle, south of Star Junction.
It's recommended to call before calling this function. If you don't, the string will be added next to the previous one that was created.

member.name: M:CCL.GTAIV.NewsScrollbar.ClearNewsScrollbar
member.summary: This method removes all text from the news scrollbar as seen in The Triangle, south of Star Junction.

member.name: T:CCL.GTAIV.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:CCL.GTAIV.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:CCL.GTAIV.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:CCL.GTAIV.Properties.Resources.IV_MP_Scripts
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to carsteal coop_bombdbase coop_drugfac coop_swatasslt deathmatch_cr freemode_cr initialnet mpcellphone mpcellphonecalling mpcellphonemain mpcellphonenetwork mpcellphoneparty network_main network_startup party_mode races_cr roving_cr speechcontrol_net tm_base tm_vip txtlnkmiss_net .

member.name: P:CCL.GTAIV.Properties.Resources.IV_Scripts
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to advanced_car_actions ambairpotarea ambatmq ambbar ambbarrier ambbeggar ambblkhawk ambbouncer ambbridgepatrol ambbusker ambcabaret ambcargoholddoors ambchurchdoors ambclublights ambcomedyclub ambcontrolloader ambcontrolmain ambdealer ambdebug ambfloater ambgerry3doorlock ambhelicopter ambhomelandcordon ambhomelandfed ambhomelandsirens ambhotel ambinternetcafe ambjerseydocksgates ambjimslocks ambliftdoors ambnightclubext ambpimpnpros ambpoledancer ambpolrdblk ambpreacher amb [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:CCL.GTAIV.Properties.Resources.TBOGT_MP_Scripts
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to basejumplauncher_mp debug_net e2_deathmatch e2_freemode e2_party_mode e2_quickdm e2_races initialnet mpcellphone mpcellphonecalling mpcellphonemain mpcellphonenetwork mpcellphoneparty network_main network_session_net network_startup parachutelauncher_mp parachute_player_mp speechcontrol_net .
